about.text: I am a Computer Science and Engineering graduate from NIT Silchar, with a passion for software development and machine learning. I have led a team of developers in organizing workshops and events, and I am actively involved in various projects that leverage my skills in programming and problem-solving.

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern
experience.description:
- Worked on setting up CI/CD pipelines and automating deployment processes.
- Created cloud infrastructure to manage applications and services.
- Developed and maintained web applications using React and Node.js.
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions.

experience.title: Lead
experience.description:
- Led a team of 80+ developers in organizing 22 workshops and events.
- Mentored junior developers and provided guidance on best practices.
- Coordinated with industry professionals to enhance learning experiences.
- Managed community outreach and engagement activities.

experience.title: Computer Science and Engineering Student
experience.description:
- Pursued a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science and Engineering.
- Engaged in various academic projects and research activities.
- Participated in coding competitions and hackathons to enhance problem-solving skills.
- Involved in student organizations and technical clubs.

experience.title: Intern
experience.description:
- Developed React applications from scratch.
- Implemented responsive web designs and ensured cross-browser compatibility.
- Collaborated with the design team to create user-friendly interfaces

experience.title: Software Developer Intern
experience.description:
- Developed the website from scratch using React.js.
- Implemented and integrated RESTful APIs for data retrieval and manipulation.
- Collaborated with the design team to create a user-friendly interface.
- Conducted testing and debugging to ensure high-quality software delivery.

projects.name: Implementing ML concepts
projects.description: In this repository, I have implemented various machine learning concepts using Python and its libraries. The projects doesn't deliver anything unique but are a good way to understand the concepts and algorithms used in a lot of these papers.

projects.name: Zero watermarking for medical images
projects.description: In this thesis, we have implemented a zero watermarking technique for medical images using deep learning. The project focuses on using Vision Transformers (ViT) to extract features from medical images and then apply a zero watermarking technique to ensure the integrity and authenticity of the images.

projects.name: Aquintel
projects.description: Early Oil spill detection sytem leveraging anomaly in vessel's AIS data and SAR satellite imagery. This project is a part of Smart India Hackathon 2024, under the Ministry of Earth Sciences, Government of India.

projects.name: CardioCare
projects.description: A web application that uses ESP8266 and MAX30100 sensors to monitor heart rate and oxygen levels, providing real-time health data.

projects.name: Computer Science Society: Official Website
projects.description: The offical website of the Computer Science Society of NIT Silchar, designed to provide information about the society's activities, members and events.

projects.name: Nits Hacks 6.0: Official Website
projects.description: This is the official website of Nits Hacks 6.0, a hackathon event organized by NIT Silchar. The website provides information about the event, including registration details, schedule, and resources for participants.

projects.name: AIINITS: Official Website
projects.description: This is the official website of All India Inter-NIT Tournament, a sports event that brings together students from various NITs across India to compete in different sports.
